email.possibleFraudFooter: Nyem rau ntawm lub zej zog hauv qab no, nkag mus ua tus thawj coj thiab xaiv Kev tswj hwm Kev dag ntxias los ntawm cov ntawv qhia zaub mov.
email.possibleFraudSubHeader: Tus naj npawb ntawm kev ua tau zoo uas muaj feem ntau 75% kev pheej hmoo ntawm kev dag ntxias
email.possibleFraudInformation: Peb lub tshuab tsis siv neeg tau txheeb xyuas tau kev ua tau zoo uas muaj peev xwm dag ntxias. Koj tuaj yeem saib xyuas kom zoo dua los ntawm Cov thawj coj zej zog interface. Qee qhov ntawm kev ua no tej zaum muaj laj thawj tsis yog kev dag ntxias yog li ntawd ceev faj rau kev tshawb fawb kom zoo ua ntej tshem tawm cov ntsiab lus.
email.possibleFraudHeader: Kev ua tau zoo uas muaj peev xwm dag ntxias
email.automaticToxicityDetection: Cov ntsiab lus no tau raug cim cia li tsis zoo siv AI algorithms uas kwv yees cov ntsiab lus ntawm cov ntsiab lus. Koj tuaj yeem tshem tawm cov ntsiab lus yog tias tsim nyog.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionVision: Ib qho AI algorithm tau cim cia cov duab pom kev nrog rau cov ntsiab lus no. Qhov algorithm no xyuas duab rau cov duab muaj peev xwm laus, kev ua phem, kev kho mob, thiab cov duab tsis zoo. Koj tuaj yeem tshem tawm cov ntsiab lus yog tias tsim nyog.
email.automaticToxicityDetectionDisclaimer: Thaum twg AI algorithm suav ib qho qhab nia tsis raug, nyob rau hauv qhov xwm txheej ntawd tsis txhob txhawj, koj tsis tas yuav ua dab tsi ntxiv thiab tuaj yeem tsis quav ntsej txog email no.
